game.name: That is not the ball!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A typing adventure about a dog playing catch the ball! Protect your dog by spelling out words to defeat mysterious creatures before they get your dog. Your keyboard is your only defense in this world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A typing adventure about a dog playing catch the ball! Protect your dog by spelling out words to defeat mysterious creatures before they get your dog. Your keyboard is your only defense in this world.
